docs.title: DATA.POOL
docs.text: DATA.POOL is a discord bot for Cyberpunk RED. Source code can be found here

docs.title: How to use
docs.text: Simply invite it to one of your servers, authorize it, and have fun. Or don't. I'm not your mom.

docs.title: Features
docs.text: It rolls dice, it looks up items, and pulls up rules for you. What else could you possibly need?

docs.title: Roll
docs.text:
Roll some dice.

/roll {type} {modifier} {label}

  • type - required; type of die to roll, either d10 or d6
  • modifier - optional; bonus to be added to a d10 roll, or the number of d6s to roll. Default 0 for d10, default 1 for d6
  • label - optional; message output before roll in bold. Default "Roll"

docs.title: Item
docs.text:
Pull up an item.

/item {category} {name}

  • category - required; category of the item you want to pull up
  • name - required; name of the item within the specified category

docs.title: Rule
docs.text:
Pull up a rule.

/rule {name}

  • name - required; name of the rule to pull up

docs.title: Disclaimer
docs.text: DATA.POOL is unofficial content provided under the Homebrew Content Policy of R. Talsorian Games and is not approved or endorsed by RTG. This content references materials that are the property of R. Talsorian Games and its licensees.

docs.title: Resources
docs.text:
• Discord Interactions API
  • Cloudflare workers for hosting
  • Supabase for database
  • First version of nightmarket data thanks to renegadejade.
  • Discord API tutorial Getting Started
  • Cloudflare worker example

docs.title: Support
docs.text: If you want to support me and the work I do, I have a ko-fi.

docs.title: SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?
How we use your data
docs.text:
We don't. In fact, there isn't even a we, it's just one person. The only thing I keep track of is your discord id and global name so I can ensure only people who verifiably have access to the Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook can access information in it through the bot. That's it, though. And I don't use it for anything else. Wouldn't be very punk to sell your data, would it?

So go enjoy this little treat for free!
